title: <<願榮光歸香港>> 英文版 v4

replies.msg:
小試牛刀 不喜勿插～ ( 個歌名直抄左七劍浣春秋，請見諒)

<<願榮光歸香港>>
<Glory be to thee Hong Kong>

何以 這土地 淚再流
We gave in our tears for this land
何以 令眾人 亦憤恨
We gave in our lives our dreams for long
昂首 拒默沉 吶喊聲 響透
But when tyranny ate our boys and girls.
盼自由 歸於 這裡
Now it’s time, give in no more.

何以 這恐懼 抹不走
For those live their lives under fear
何以 為信念 從沒退後
For those hold captive for their beliefs
何解 血在流 但邁進聲 響透
For those shed the blood for this promised land
建自由 光輝 香港
“Heung Kong Yan”, our fate it is.

在晚星 墜落 徬徨午夜
In the night when terror fills the air.
迷霧裡 最遠處吹來 號角聲
In our dreams we hear the people heartfelt cry:
捍自由 來齊集這裡 來全力抗對
“We will fight, fight for our right, right to rejoice:
勇氣 智慧 也永不滅
the revolution of our time.”

黎明來到 要光復 這香港
This is our land our hearts shall belong.
同行兒女 為正義 時代革命
This is our time for justice we free Hong Kong.
祈求 民主與自由 萬世都不朽
Come on we stand-in-hand and a new day will dawn.
我願榮光歸香港
Glory be to thee Hong Kong!
掂喎，岩岩唱左次覺得好正
